title: [K-12] Development of STEAM-C Integrated Learning Tools: Mobile Microlearning for Enhancing Creative Thinking Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic STEAM education concepts and integrated cultural learning theories
context.additional_context: Asynchronous learning conducted in a smartphone-based, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the development stages (ADDIE model) of an integrated STEAM-C learning device.
Learners can design mobile-optimized learning modules (lesson plans, activity sheets, etc.).
Learners can develop creative thinking assessment tools incorporating cultural elements.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
